WorkItem.ClosedComment: RTFM Warlock hasn't been updated in forever and these issues have already been reported a few DOZEN times.
WorkItem.Description: I'm not sure if I'm missing something here or not but  if I'm below hit cap and not using hit buff why is Rawr showing item upgrades that do not have hit?.  Also when I do include the hit buff Rawr still tells me I need items with hit as an upgrade.  Assume there is still a big problem with Warlock model.

Comments.Message: Also, in this latest release of Rawr haste is still a big problem it seems.
Sorry, I was under the impression warlocks had been updated in this latest release. Total misunderstanding.
